Body: I am trying to run the ArcGIS for Android samples in Android Emulator. Based on the ArcGIS recommendation, I have installed the Intel HAXM and enabled the GPU Emulation as well.While running the application with Emulator it reports the below console output. It seems the application has been installed with ERRORS, but I can see the application layout without MAP and its not responding to me.Please suggest me, is it anything related to insufficient hardware or am I missing any software configuration things to get it worked?Thanks in advance![2012-08-17 12:07:02 - GeometryEditor] ------------------------------[2012-08-17 12:07:02 - GeometryEditor] Android Launch![2012-08-17 12:07:02 - GeometryEditor] adb is running normally.[2012-08-17 12:07:02 - GeometryEditor] Performing com.esri.arcgis.android.samples.geometryeditor.GeometryEditor activity launch[2012-08-17 12:07:02 - GeometryEditor] Automatic Target Mode: Preferred AVD 'AVD-4.0.3' is not available. Title: Android emulator reports 0x501 error while using GPU Emulation with OpenGL ES

history.Text: I am trying to run the **ArcGIS for Android** samples in Android Emulator. Based on the [ArcGIS recommendation][1], I have installed the **Intel HAXM** and enabled the **GPU Emulation** as well.While running the application with Emulator it reports the below console output. It seems the application has been **installed with ERRORS**, but I can see the application layout **without MAP** and its not responding to me.Please suggest me, is it anything related to insufficient hardware or am I missing any software configuration things to get it worked?Thanks in advance! [2012-08-17 12:07:02 - GeometryEditor] ------------------------------ [2012-08-17 12:07:02 - GeometryEditor] Android Launch! [2012-08-17 12:07:02 - GeometryEditor] adb is running normally. [2012-08-17 12:07:02 - GeometryEditor] Performing com.esri.arcgis.android.samples.geometryeditor.GeometryEditor activity launch [2012-08-17 12:07:02 - GeometryEditor] Automatic Target Mode: Preferred AVD 'AVD-4.0.3' is not available. Launching new emulator. [2012-08-17 12:07:02 - GeometryEditor] Launching a new emulator with Virtual Device 'AVD-4.0.3' [2012-08-17 12:07:07 - Emulator] creating window 23 23 428 713 [2012-08-17 12:07:07 - GeometryEditor] New emulator found: emulator-5554 [2012-08-17 12:07:07 - GeometryEditor] Waiting for HOME ('android.process.acore') to be launched...
